messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Alright assshatsss, Mr. Nice Tul-Ullisss isss gone for thisss ssshift, im here to eat asss and cher gum and im all out of... wait... no... IM HERE TO ASSS GUM AND CHEW KICK AND IM ALL OUTA ASSS CHEW. SSSo asss a "friendly reminder" sssuit sssensssorsss sssave livesss, consssolesss can call sssecurity blah blah... dont make my job hard and i MAYBE might sssave your asss.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
